contents: "Jul 29, 2021 - California's electric-car goal raises concerns, California is already home to the nation's largest fleet of electric vehicles, and it's signaled its intention to put more of those cars on the road with a goal to go all-electric by 2035. A Los Angeles Times series called ""The United States of California"" digs deeper into the potential environmental risks. National reporter Evan Halper joined CBSN to discuss."
